Joomla\CMS\Installer\Adapter\FileAdapter¶

class FileAdapter¶

File installer

property scriptElement¶
Type

object

Scope

protected

<scriptfile> element of the extension manifest

property supportsDiscoverInstall¶
Type

boolean

Scope

protected

Flag if the adapter supports discover installs

Adapters should override this and set to false if discover install is unsupported

property currentExtensionId¶
Type

integer

Scope

protected

ID for the currently installed extension if present

property element¶
Type

string

Scope

protected

The unique identifier for the extension (e.g. mod_login)

property extension¶
Type

Extension

Scope

protected

Extension object.

property extensionMessage¶
Type

string

Scope

protected

Messages rendered by custom scripts

property manifest¶
Type

string

Copy of the XML manifest file.

Making this object public allows extensions to customize the manifest in custom scripts.

property manifest_script¶
Type

string

Scope

protected

A path to the PHP file that the scriptfile declaration in the manifest refers to.

property name¶
Type

string

Scope

protected

Name of the extension

property route¶
Type

string

Scope

protected

Install function routing

property type¶
Type

string

Scope

protected

The type of adapter in use
